interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Aloe Vera Gel 100% Natural Moisturisers - Pure Organic Fresh Soothing Aloe-Vera Moisturizing Gel Skin Hair, Aloe Leaf Wash-free Clean After Sun Face Body (8.8 oz) Review Date: 2021/01/04 Store: CIMIY Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'CIMIY', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '8.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 11.22 Ounces'} Review Text: I got this hoping I'd be able to use it to soothe my skin post-radiation treatments. Sadly, I did not notice that this is not 100% Aloe Vera gel as was recommended by my doctor. It is "100% organic and natural", for whatever that's worth. At least Aloe Vera is the first listed ingredient. It also contains Vitamin C and E which might be OK but Hyaluronic acid is hardly what I'd want to put on tender, inflamed skin from radiation. I'm not even sure I'd want to use this on a sunburn.

So anyway, I've used it on other parts of my body that weren't zapped by radiation instead. I like the smell. It moisturizes well and the pump dispenser is easy to use. However, it leaves my skin feeling kind of sticky. Couldn't wait to go wash my hands after rubbing it on my legs. Review Title: 100% "natural" not 100% Aloe Vera Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Hair Straightener, Flat Iron for Hair Styling, 2 in 1 Hair Curling and Straightening Tool, Non-Damage Floating Ceramic Plates, Adjustable Temperature 300°F-450°F for All Hair Types and Lengths COOQIN ['If you’ve ever had your ‘do coiffed by a professional hair stylist or visited a salon, chances are you’ve heard the word ‘AUTENPOO’ tossed around a time or two. Known for its ability to strengthen hair and restore your strands to their original shine, AUTENPOO is a powerhouse nutrient in the field of hairstyling. When putting your hair under the intense heat of a flat iron or hair straightener, you’ll probably find that breakage and damage are that much more common. Packed with all sort of high-tech features and gizmos, AUTENPOO’s hair flat iron brings salon-worthy results without the harsh damage of most styling devices for a natural, healthy shine with each use! Top features of AUTENPOO hair straightener: Fast heating time&Sleep mode ●Fully heats up in 30 Seconds, Automatically switches off irons after 60 minutes. Gentle ceramic plate design ●Adds shine to make the appearance of curls more polished and increase the overall look of straightened hair for a healthier gloss. Floating Plate Design ●Particularly beneficial for users with naturally wavy or curly hair, which can have a tendency to easily snag in hair styling tools, also ensures that your gorgeous curls won’t be damaged. Heats Between 300° F And 450° F ●Depending on the thickness and texture of your hair, you may need to change it up from time to time. 360° swivel cord for easy maneuverability ● No more tangled messes or twisted cords, with this hair straightener you can easily reach delicate fly-aways and seemingly invisible back sections without the hassle of a tangled or knotted cord ever again. What‘s in the package: 1 x Hair Straightener 1 x User’s manual'] {'Shape': 'Flat', 'Brand': 'COOQIN', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Color': 'Gold', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '13.17 x 3.93 x 1.96 inches; 1 Pounds', 'UPC': '653437418216', 'Manufacturer': 'COOQIN'} This is the 2nd hair straightener I've had the opportunity to try. The other is the Furiden Professional Hair Straightener Titanium Flat Iron. I'm going to write this review as a comparison between the two since they are in the same price range. For starters, both heat up quickly, have variable temperature settings, automatic shut off and a swivel cord. The Autenpoo (who comes up with these brand names???) brand has a mechanical on/off switch that also serves as the heat selector. I prefer this over the Furiden which has on/off buttons and up/down buttons to set the temp on a digital screen. If I want, I can leave the Autenpo's dial set on the temp I want (the lowest setting it has), unplug it when I'm done, plug it in the next day and it will just turn on and go to my favorite temp. With the Furiden, I have to hold a button down to turn it on and then hit the down button 4 or 5 times to go to the lowest temp. The Autenpoo also comes with a comb, some hair clips to section your hair during styling and a heat protective glove, and has a slide lock to keep it shut when not in use. In all other aspects however, I prefer the Furiden. Autenpoo's cord is super thick bulky, seriously like a vacuum cleaner cord. It will probably last forever but adds unnecessary bulk and weight which would be especially problematic for traveling. The main advantage Furiden has is the pointed end. Not only is it better suited to tight areas close to your scalp or neckline but it can also help section your hair without needing a comb or your fingers. Furthermore, the plates, which are longer overall, extend into the pointed tip to get the heat right where you need it. Both of these irons do a perfectly fine job, but I just find the Furiden easier to use. Not bad but there are better choices AuroTrends Makeup Remover Towel,2 Pack Reusable Chemical-free Microfiber Makeup Remover Cloths,Magically and Gently Wipe Away Cosmetics,Sunscreen,Oil and Dirt,Set of 2 (Pink+Black) AuroTrends {'Brand': 'AuroTrends', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '2.0 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 2.72 x 1.42 inches; 6.4 Ounces'} This is basically a long rectangle of fleece fabric with a finished edge. How that cleans makeup without any soap, I couldn't tell you. But it does! I just barely dampen one small section with plain tap water and am able to wipe away liquid foundation, eye shadow and mascara. I use a different section for the next day and toss the cloth in the wash at the end of the week. I confess, that I don't normally wash my face at night. I hate using those prepackaged make up remover wipes. Single-use disposable products seem wasteful and environmentally unfriendly to me in general plus they are just like a cold slap on your face right before bed. Even if I use cold water on this cloth, it didn't seem that cold on my face and there is no waste or ongoing cost other than washing. My pillow case appreciates this product! Don't know how- but this works! Travel Bottles Keychain, 1.7oz/50ml Portable Hand Sanitizer Bottles, Fine Mist Spray Keychain Bottles, Empty Leakproof Refillable Containers with Flip/Spray Cap Plastic Travel Bottles (5PC) XITENBAO {'Brand': 'XITENBAO', 'Material': 'Silicone,Plastic', 'Capacity': '50 Milliliters, 1.7 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Portable, Mist Spray, Leakproof', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 7 x 2.5 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'klp-001', 'UPC': '192408404112'} Pros- carabiner to attach to purse or backpack, choice of spray or flip top
Cons- Flip top is hard to open

It is likely that after repeated use, the flip top will become easier to open. But when they are new, the plug that completes the seal has such a tight fit that I can barely flip it open at all. I guess I will never have to worry about it leaking! In addition to the obvious use for hand sanitizer, these can be used for sunscreen or travel toiletries like shampoo or non-aerosol hairspray. Versatile & handy Hand Sanitizer Dearskin Alcohol 75% Based Gel Infused with Aloe Vera 2oz/60ml, Skin Care Natural Antibacterial, Refreshing Moisturizing, Pure Disinfection, Small Hand Sanitizer (3 Pack) Dearskin ['Dearskin Hand Sanitizer 60ml, 2oz', 'Dearskin Hand sanitizer Kills 99.9% of the most common germs!', '- Clean and Refreshing Moisturizing;', '- Long-Lasting Antibacterial;', '- Easy to use, hard to waste;', '- 75% Isopropyl Alcohol;', 'Drug Facts: Active ingredients: - Isopropyl Alcohol 75% v/v. Antiseptic.', 'Use: Hand sanitizer to help reduce bacteria that potentially can cause disease. For use when soap and water are not available.', 'For external use only. Flammable. Keep away from or flame.', 'Do not use: - In children less than 2 months of age. - On open skin wounds.', 'When using this product keep out of eyes, and mouth. In case of contact with eyes, rinse eyes thoroughly with water.', 'Stop use and ask a doctor if irritation or rash occurs. These may be sings of a serious condition.', 'Keep out of reach of children.', 'If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.', 'Directions: - Place enough product on hands to cover all surfaces. Rub hands together until dry. -', 'Supervise children under 6 years of age when use this product to avoid swallowing.', 'Other information: Store between 15-30C (59-86F). Avoid freezing and excessive heat above 40C (104F).', 'Inactive ingredients: Deionized Water, Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Carbomer, Arginine, Silver Ions.', 'Distributed by: Dearskin LLC, FL'] {'Brand': 'Dearskin', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Special Feature': 'Antibacterial, Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Scent free', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2.5 x 3 inches; 2 Ounces'} These small bottles of hand sanitizer are part of the new normal. They are the perfect size to keep in a desk drawer or car. The product is thick so I don't accidentally spill it and it does not seem to dry out my skin. Even after they get the vaccine, I will probably keep these handy because colds and the flu aren't any fun either. Don't leave home without it! Aloe Vera Gel 100% Natural Moisturisers - Pure Organic Fresh Soothing Aloe-Vera Moisturizing Gel Skin Hair, Aloe Leaf Wash-free Clean After Sun Face Body (8.8 oz) CIMIY {'Brand': 'CIMIY', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '8.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 11.22 Ounces'} I got this hoping I'd be able to use it to soothe my skin post-radiation treatments. Sadly, I did not notice that this is not 100% Aloe Vera gel as was recommended by my doctor. It is "100% organic and natural", for whatever that's worth. At least Aloe Vera is the first listed ingredient. It also contains Vitamin C and E which might be OK but Hyaluronic acid is hardly what I'd want to put on tender, inflamed skin from radiation. I'm not even sure I'd want to use this on a sunburn.

So anyway, I've used it on other parts of my body that weren't zapped by radiation instead. I like the smell. It moisturizes well and the pump dispenser is easy to use. However, it leaves my skin feeling kind of sticky. Couldn't wait to go wash my hands after rubbing it on my legs. 100% "natural" not 100% Aloe Vera
profile:
**User Summary Update:**

- **Product Focus:** The user continues to prioritize hair styling tools and reusable makeup removal products, while increasingly incorporating skincare items, notably hand sanitizers and aloe vera-based products, reflecting a comprehensive interest in personal care essentials.
- **Brand Awareness:** They actively compare a diverse array of brands and extend this scrutiny to skincare, particularly focusing on natural and organic labels, especially in hygiene products alongside hair tools.
- **Preference for Features:** Values practicality in skincare, particularly in moisturizing hand sanitizers and soothing gels, with a focus on non-drying and easy-to-use formulas that enhance user experience.
- **Material Preference:** The user exhibits a consistent preference for environmentally friendly materials, highlighted by the choice of products containing natural ingredients, such as aloe vera, which indicate a desire for functional and eco-conscious options.
- **Functionality:** They seek versatile products that support hygiene and skin health, demonstrating an integrated approach to both hair and skincare routines.
- **User Experience:** Favors products that are convenient to use and travel-friendly, with recent purchases reflecting a desire for easy application and effective results.
- **Comparison and Evaluation:** Continues to assess skincare products critically, particularly focusing on ingredient effectiveness and usability, ensuring chosen products align with personal health needs.
- **Overall Rating Trend:** The user maintains a commitment to practicality, eco-friendliness, and versatility in personal care, demonstrating adaptability in enhancing their daily routines with a diverse mix of hair and skincare products.
